title: Clams and Chorizo in Tomato Sauce
ingredients: ['24 small clams in shell, scrubbed', '4 tablespoons dry polenta or cornmeal', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '225g chorizo sausage, diced', '1 medium red onion, sliced', '1 pinch crushed chillies (optional)', '250ml dark beer', '225ml fish stock', '2 (400g) tins chopped plum tomatoes', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano', 'salt and pepper to taste']
